mapper.select: SELECT a.assignment_id, c.course_id, c.course_name, a.assignment_name, a.enddate, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, NOW(), a.enddate) AS dday FROM course_registration cr JOIN course c ON cr.course_id = c.course_id JOIN assignment a ON a.course_id = c.course_id LEFT JOIN submitted_assignment sa ON sa.assignment_id = a.assignment_id AND sa.user_id = cr.user_id WHERE cr.user_id = #{userId} -- 필요하면 수강 상태 조건 추가 -- AND cr.status = 'ENROLLED' AND sa.assignment_id IS NULL AND a.enddate >= NOW() ORDER BY a.enddate ASC LIMIT 3
